name: Swip Swipe: Quick Thinking, Mind Boggling, Headache Causing phenomenon
name_original: Swip Swipe: Quick Thinking, Mind Boggling, Headache Causing phenomenon
description:
Swipe the arrows as fast as you can.

*Arcade Mode
*Time Attack
*Race Mode

Share to your friends and see if they can beat your Top Score.


Swipe the black arrows in the directions they are showing.
Swipe the Striped arrows in the reverse direction they are showing.

But be careful! Theres a TIME LIMIT, and you just might Lose!
